body_html: @e14159 can you try with -D_FORCE_INLINES? I just had the same issue with pcl, I checked the string.h header, and using that preprocessor directive skips the block where the memcpy error appears. There's probably a cleaner workaround though...
body_text: @e14159 can you try with -D_FORCE_INLINES? I just had the same issue with pcl, I checked the string.h header, and using that preprocessor directive skips the block where the memcpy error appears. There's probably a cleaner workaround though...
body: @e14159 can you try with `-D_FORCE_INLINES`? I just had the same issue with pcl, I checked the `string.h` header, and using that preprocessor directive skips the block where the `memcpy` error appears. There's probably a cleaner workaround though...
